string.text: Fox asked me to find a briefcase he had dropped and take it to Sidorovich. It contains some old papers that had been stolen from the army roadblock. When making his request Fox behaved in such a manner, as if he did not care at all. One man show, damn... He said the case was behind the southern outpost's fence, near a toilet and a heap of rubbish. Man, he couldn't have found a "better" place to drop it off...
Find the case that was stolen by Fox.
Fox dropped off his case somewhere here...

Hm... interesting... Nothing special, but it sheds some more light on the matter... It looks like not all the docs are here. There must be another briefcase somewhere with the rest of them. Here's a small present for your trouble, Marked One. And tell Fox... No, better I get in touch with him myself.
Look, there's a briefcase with some papers. Fox asked me to bring it to you. He said, he had stolen it from the military outpost...

Hey, Marked One, there're some docs I've happened to filch from the military outpost. Would you care to take them to Sidorovich? But... I have dropped off the briefcase when scarpering from those... And I really am to meet one guy here, so I cannot leave. Can you fetch it? It's behind the southern outpost's fence. You only have to slip accurately across the minefield, get behind the wire via the tree-trunk over there, then along the fence to a pile of garbage... There's a toilet nearby, so you won't miss the place - you'll sense it, ha-ha... Sidorovich is quite interested in those papers, so you won't regret the efforts!

You see, Marked One, I need some papers to be carried to Sidorovich... The problem is, the briefcase has been dropped off when I was scarpering from those... And I really am to meet one guy here, so I cannot leave. Can you fetch it? It's not far from here, by the cross that sticks up in the field over there. Sidorovich is quite interested in those papers, so you won't regret the efforts!
Sorry, I can not - I've got my hands full.
You've been asking for help, haven't you?
Rookie's PDA from the Cordon. It's filled with all sorts of nonsense, but one note that talks about a strange glow near the tunnel is interesting.
A canister of drinking water that someone had prepared in advance.
%c[100,50,250,50] Peace to the hut, brother! Don't beat me up, you tramp, we'd better talk.%c[default]
A large aluminum mug in which the prisoners brewed a very strong tea called "chifir".
A large aluminum mug in which the prisoners brewed a very strong tea called "chifir". A hole has been drilled in the bottom for some reason.
%c[100,50,250,50]Chuhan's cache: a placemark on the map.%c[default]
Car with goods \n (to start, you need a key)
But you can drive away this car Kulgavomu...
The key to the truck with goods belonging to the neutral merchant Drozd.
A piece of paper on which the stalker Filin left a message to his comrades.
%c[255,255,118,118]Blackbird:%c[default] %c[100,50,250,50] Man, come to our sawmill! There is work for honest people.%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50] Hey stalker, need some help. We're in the house behind the fence.%c[default]
The coordinates are scrawled on the safe.
To tell about this safe Kulkevaa?
The key to the safe is in the attic in the Hollow.
%c[100,50,250,50]Cheeky, don't go far. Look at the light, I'm under the bridge.%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50] Greyhound, don't go far. Look at the light, I'm under the bridge.%c[default]
%c[100,50,250,50] Pen, don't go far. Look at the light, I'm under the bridge.%c[default]
PDA Reshaly from the Raven gang. Contains plans for deception and to eliminate the authority Kolganova, as well as personal caches Reshaly.
Contains information about the informant's cache with valuable information.
Map of one of the central regions of the Zone, contains a label with the text "Klondike artifacts".
The weapon that was seized from us by a bandit named Troll.
%c[255,255,118,118]Godfather diamonds pressed and dumps! Hold him!!!%c[default]
Unique artifacts from the Klondike. They are of particular value.
This artifact was formed weak and almost devoid of properties.
Truth... I have to find her.
